title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Restructured profile contributions documentation: replaced `viewing-contributions-on-your-profile.md` with a new concept file (`contributions-visible-on-your-profile.md`) and moved how-to content to a dedicated guide.
Enhanced billing documentation: added `cost-centers.md` concept, created `cost-center-allocation.md` reference, and updated tutorials with reusable content.
Updated OpenAPI schemas: added `issue_field_values` to issue objects and `sha_pinning_required` to actions permissions.
